name: Dungeoneer (itch)
description:
This is the first 3D game I ever made & finished and it's only on here 2 keep me humble.

  • You are the little ball. You must delve into the dark dungeon and fetch enough crystals to ensure you can retire in comfort.
  • Can you survive and thrive long and hard enough to achieve the fabled Wealthy ranking?

CONTROLS
WASD/arrow keys to move
E to heal for 5 crystals


made by Andrew Pope in 2015 with Unity 5 & bfxr
music and sounds courtesy of freesoundfx and looperman.com
